inputColumn.comments: Number of elementary period in the day. This number starts from 0. For example, if the duration of elementary period specified in the name of the file is 1800 seconds, then the elementary period number is in the interval [0, 47].
Average number of simultaneous conversations during the elementary period. Simultaneity is evaluated per second. Conversations taken into account are those that started during the day.
Maximum number of simultaneous conversations during the elementary period.
Date of the first peak of simultaneous conversations. The format of this date is : YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss Example: "2006-10-02 10:18:05"
